name: Block Monsters
description: Block Monsters is a blockchain game that involves collecting and training of NFT based creatures called ""Blockmons"" and using them to battle and trade with others all over the world. Block Monsters is reviving childhood memories by bringing nostalgic game vibes into the crypto space. Battle & Train! Collect new Blockmon NFTs on the Marketplace or catch them in the game. The Play2Earn Allocation in the tokenomics allows gamers to earn $MNSTRS tokens for completion of events within the game.
